Judul: ENTREPRENEURSHIP EDUCATION AT UNIVERSITY LEVEL (Case Study: Entrepreneurship Track Undergraduate Program in School of Business and Management, Bandung Institute of Technology)
Abstrak: This research uses the exploratory research of observation, depth interviews, and literature studies. Observation was conducted during the two years program while the depth interviews approach the four e-track students as respondents. Benchmarking to three other universities providing entrepreneurship education program is also done through observation, literature study and interview. This research was designed to review and evaluate the first run of this program in educating students to be entrepreneur. The result of the analysis indicates that this program has been successful partially. In terms of personal and sociological, e-track has provided a very good education program. However, for environmental factors, e-track still needs some improvements.
Kata Kunci: entrepreneurship education, entrepreneurial process, e-track SBM ITB
